mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COMMUNITY_COMMENT WHERE COMMUNITY_COMMENT_NO = #{communityCommentNo}m AND NOTICE_CATEGORY =#{noticeCategory} AND NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
mapper.select: SELECT C.NICKNAME, M.PROFILE, C.COMMUNITY_COMMENT_NO, C.COMMUNITY_COMMENT, C.NOTICE_CATEGORY, C.NOTICE_NO FROM MEMBER AS M, COMMUNITY_COMMENT AS C WHERE M.ID = C.ID;
